content: bring the entire zodiac to life with this complete zodiac crochet tapestry pattern pdf ✨ this beautifully designed 38-page printable pdf includes ✨ all 12 zodiac sign crochet tapestry patterns + the moon & stars centerpiece designed to tie the collection together ✨ clear easy-to-follow written instructions for each piece which includes a graph/grid style pattern + color block instructions for every tile pattern in english only using us crochet terms ✨ consistent layout across all patterns for easy reference and printing ✨ thorough video tutorials to help you with the techniques used in tapestry crochet seaming tiles together adding fringe and mounting the tapestry onto a dowel whether you want to crochet a single sign a small grouping or the full zodiac tapestry display this collection has everything you need in one convenient file perfect for wall hangings gifts or creating a stunning meaningful home display skill level confident beginners to intermediate crocheters familiarity with reading written patterns and basic color changes if you ve never done tapestry crochet before i have a complete masterclass for you which is included with the pattern materials needed worsted weight yarn 4 50 mm crochet hook scissors tapestry/yarn needle and optional blocking materials size -individual zodiac symbol tiles measure about 6 25 each -moon & stars tapestry tile measures 12 5 x 12 5 -total tapestry measurement of 25 25 wide x 26 tall __________ join me subscribe to the off the beaten hook community for free patterns video tutorials and printable
